lawt.engine

Interface Window.DrawCall

  • Enclosing class:
    Window
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface Window.DrawCall
    Implement if you want a custom draw call for a window.

    By default, the only way to draw on a window is by using an Entity. A custom draw call can be implemented to draw on a window independent from an entity.

    Entities aren't affected by DrawCall; entities are always drawn on top of everything.

    Implementation:

    Window w = Window w = new Window(800, 400, "Test window!");
    Window.DrawCall myDrawCall = (Graphics g) -> {//draw functionality...};
    w.setDrawCall(myDrawCall);

    Author:
    Lucas
